column2: "Enyido adzehu bɔnsa no ho atsɛmbusɛm. Ebɛnadze yɛ hom na hom afow yi
column3: hom nyinara kɔ adantsifi koraa yi?"

column2: "Ɔwo a esebɔ ahyɛ wo ma
column3: weɔɔweɔɔyɛ kurow
column4: ahosɛpɛw man; w’atɔfoe wɔanntotɔ afona ano

column2: "Wo tumdzifo nyina bɔɔ mu guanguanee kɔree
column3: nnyɛ egyentofo kyekyeer hɔn: hɔn a wohun hɔn no nyina wɔkyekyeer hɔn
column4: kaansa woguanee kɔr ekyirekyir mpo a."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na mesee dɛ
column3: Hom nyi hom enyi mfi mo do
column4: ma munsu wenwennwen; mma hom mmper nnkyekye mo werɛ
column5: wɔ me man ne babaa ne sɛɛe no ho."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: dɔm EWURADZE no
column6: na enyibɔ da wɔ enyido adzehu bɔnsa no do; ɔfasu no ndwuruwii na mbepɔw ho sufrɛ."

column2: "Na Elam kitsaa egyen kotoku
column3: ɔnye ntseaseanammufo na mpɔnkɔdofo; na Kir maa kyɛm no ho daa hɔ."

column2: "Ntseaseanam yɛɛ wo mbɔnsa fɛfɛɛfɛw mu amaama
column3: na mpɔnkɔdofo totoo nkuropon no ano."

column2: "Na oeyi Juda akataho no efi hɔ; da no ehwɛɛ akodze a ɔwɔ kwaa mu fi no mu no."
"Na hom hun David kurow no ne mpaapaae no
column3: dɛ wɔayɛ pii: na hom boaboaa ase nsutaae no no nsu ano."

column2: "Na hom kaan Jerusalɛm adan
column3: na hom bubuu adan no dɛ hom dze rowowaw afasu no."

column2: "Hom yɛɛ korabea so wɔ afasu ebien no ntamu dze maa nsutaae dadaw no no nsu; naaso hom annhwɛ onyia no a ɔyɛɛ adze yi
column3: eso hom emmbu nyia a ɔhyehyɛɛ no dadaada no bi."

column2: "Na da no mu
column3: EWURADZE

column2: "naaso hwɛ
column3: hom dze enyigye na ahosɛpɛw
column5: namdzi nye nsanom. Hom kaa dɛ

column2: "Na dɔm EWURADZE yii me asotsiw dɛ
column3: Ampaara wɔnnkɛfa emumuyɛ yi akyɛ hom ma ekodu dɛ hom bowuwu

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE
column3: dɔm EWURADZE no
column5: Kɔ fotosamfo Sebna yi a odzi ofi no do no nkyɛn kɛse dɛ
column7: "Ereyɛ dɛn wɔ ha na woana na ewɔ no wɔ ha
column8: na etwa asamandan wɔ ha yi? Irutwa asamandan wɔ sor
column9: na irututu tsenabea ama wo ho wɔ botan mu yi?"

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: EWURADZE bɔtow wo akyen enyiberdo dɛ ɔkatakyi

column2: "Ampaara ɔbɛdandan wo atow wo sor dɛ etɔw akyen ekyirekyir asaase do; hɔ na ibowu
column3: na hɔ na w’enyimnyam ntseaseanam bɔkɔ
column4: ɔwo a eyɛ wo wura fie enyimguase."

column2: "Na mubosun wo efi wo dzibew
column3: na wobodwuruw wo efi wo gyinabea."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba wɔ da no mu dɛ mebɛfrɛ m’akowaa Eliakim
column3: Hilkia ba no:"

column2: "na medze w’atar no ahyɛ no
column3: na medze w’abɔdo emia no
column4: na medze w’ahendzi mpanyindzi ahyɛ ne nsa: na ɔayɛ egya ama Jerusalɛmfo

column2: "Na medze David fie saafee bɔto ne batsir; na obobue
column3: na obiara nnkɔtow mu; na ɔbɔtow mu

column2: "Na mebɛpaa no do dɛ prɛgow a ɔwɔ mbrɛ hɔ yɛ dzen
column3: na ɔbɛyɛ enyimnyam ahengua ama n’egya fie."

column2: "Na wɔdze n’egya fie enyimnyam nyina bɛsensɛn no do
column3: n’asefo nye hɔn a wofi no mu nyina
column5: ofi kukuwa do kesi asahina do."

column2: "Da no mu
column3: dɔm EWURADZE na ɔse
column4: prɛgow a wɔdze bɔɔ mbrɛ hɔ yɛ dzen no bɔhɔr; na woetwa ma ɔatɔ famu
column5: na adzesoa a ɔsensɛn do no atsew atɔ; na EWURADZE na ɔaka."
